source_content: Intel Core i7-13700K and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090 Technical Specifications

tech_specs.pdf.description: Test data for tech_specs.pdf - Intel Core i7-13700K and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090 specifications

factual_questions.question: What products are described in this technical specification document?
acceptableResponses: Intel processor and NVIDIA graphics card

factual_questions.question: How many cores does the Intel Core i7-13700K have?
What is the maximum boost frequency of the Intel Core i7-13700K?
How many CUDA cores does the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090 have?
How much memory does the RTX 4090 have?
What architecture does the RTX 4090 use?
What socket does the Intel Core i7-13700K use?

hallucination_tests.question: What AMD processors are mentioned in this document?
What Apple Silicon chips are discussed in this specification?
What are the current market prices for these components?
How do these specifications compare to mobile processors?

analytical_questions.question: What are the key performance highlights of these components?
What are the power requirements for these components?
What memory technologies are supported by these components?
What are the main technical features of the i7-13700K processor?

edge_cases.question: What are the detailed technical implications of the hybrid architecture design methodology implemented in the Intel Core i7-13700K processor's performance and efficiency core configuration as it relates to modern multi-threaded workload optimization paradigms?

relevance.description: How well does the answer relate to the question and document content?
relevance.context_for_judge: The document contains technical specifications for Intel Core i7-13700K processor and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090 graphics card with detailed hardware specifications, performance metrics, and technical features.

accuracy.description: How factually correct is the answer based on the actual document content?
accuracy.context_for_judge: Verify answers against actual technical specifications: Intel i7-13700K has 16 cores (8 P-cores + 8 E-cores), 24 threads, 5.4 GHz boost frequency, LGA-1700 socket, 125W TDP. RTX 4090 has Ada Lovelace architecture, 16,384 CUDA cores, 24 GB GDDR6X memory, 450W TDP.

completeness.description: How thoroughly does the answer address the question?

grounding.description: How well is the answer grounded in the source document content?
grounding.context_for_judge: Answers should reference actual technical specifications, performance metrics, and hardware features from the tech specs document, not make up details or reference other products not mentioned.

document_context_for_llm_judge.tech_specs.pdf: Contains technical specifications for Intel Core i7-13700K processor (13th-gen Raptor Lake, 16 cores/24 threads, 5.4 GHz boost, LGA-1700 socket, 125W TDP) and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090 graphics card (Ada Lovelace architecture, 5nm, 16,384 CUDA cores, 24 GB GDDR6X, 450W TDP, $1,599 MSRP). Includes performance benchmarks (Cinebench R23: ~30,700 pts, Geekbench 6: ~17,000 multi-core, FP32: ~82.6 TFLOPS), memory support (DDR4-3200/DDR5-5600, GDDR6X), and technical features (Hyper-Threading, Turbo Boost, Thread Director, NVENC, NVDEC, Ray Tracing).
